abstract: “With debuts of two new shows, Fox edged into first place Wednesday in the ratings among adults 18 to 49,” Benjamin Toff writes in today’s Times. “Fox’s new 9 p.m. offering, ‘Kitchen Nightmares,’ with the chef Gordon Ramsay (‘Hell’s Kitchen’), earned the night’s top ratings in that demographic, although it attracted just 6.6 million total viewers, Nielsen estimated. Earlier, the 8 p.m. hour proved especially competitive. Fox’s new comedy ‘Back to You,’ with Kelsey Grammer and Patricia Heaton, made a strong debut in the first half hour (9.4 million), followed by a slower start for Season 2 of ‘Til Death’ at 8:30 (7.8 million).”
lead_paragraph: “With debuts of two new shows, Fox edged into first place Wednesday in the ratings among adults 18 to 49,” Benjamin Toff writes in today’s Times. “Fox’s new 9 p.m. offering, ‘Kitchen Nightmares,’ with the chef Gordon Ramsay (‘Hell’s Kitchen’), earned the night’s top ratings in that demographic, although it attracted just 6.6 million total viewers, Nielsen estimated. Earlier, the 8 p.m. hour proved especially competitive. Fox’s new comedy ‘Back to You,’ with Kelsey Grammer and Patricia Heaton, made a strong debut in the first half hour (9.4 million), followed by a slower start for Season 2 of ‘Til Death’ at 8:30 (7.8 million).”

headline.main: Premieres Help Fox Win Among 18 to 49 Year Olds
